title: Training on Constructivist Teaching Methods Using ICT for K-12 Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education knowledge and general digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Participants are pre-service or in-service K-12 science teachers required to master student-centered ICT-integrated teaching methods, with emphasis on personal device-based practice and mandatory use of online/offline collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more science lesson design strategies based on constructivist learning theory.
Learners develop one or more student-centered science class models using ICT tools (digital collaboration platforms, data analysis tools, etc.).
Learners design and apply a rubric to assess student-led ICT-based science learning activities.

resources: Access to ICT Platforms for Science Education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
